paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a heterozygous TTR variant associated with cardiac amyloidosis in a patient.

patients.phenotype: TTR-related cardiac amyloidosis with exclusive cardiomyopathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: exclusive cardiomyopathy, severe global myocardial impairment, left ventricular ejection fraction of 35%
individual_records.evidence_sentence: He had no other systemic involvement and no significant family history.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with TTR-related cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: Not applicable, as only one patient is reported.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate, based on clinical presentation and variant type.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first case of TTR-related cardiac amyloidosis caused by p.Val142Ala mutation reported in an Asian patient.
key_quotes: This case highlights the importance to exclude transthyretin-related cardiac amyloidosis as a cause of extensive cardiomyopathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
